artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Wabinureba/ ima hata onaji/ Naniwa naru/ mi o tsukushite mo/ awanu to zo omou 詫ぬれハ　今はたおなし　難波なる　身をつくしても　あはんとそ思う
markings: censor seal: kiwame 極; publisher\'s seal: Eijudō 永寿堂
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Poems Explained by the Nurse (Hyakunin isshu uba ga etoki 百人一首うはか縁説)
signed: Saki no Hokusai Manji 前北斎卍
title: Poem by Motoyoshi Shinnō
